translation.en: ♪ Little by little Let's live in the meow ♪
♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
translation.it: Miao, mià, miao, mià, miao Miao!

translation.en: ♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
translation.it: Miao, mià, miao, mià, miao Miao! Miao, mià, miao, mià, miao

translation.en: -♪ Hey, Gabby ♪ -♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
-♪ What's the big surprise? ♪ -♪ Meow, meow ♪
♪ Let's shrink right down and go inside ♪
Oh, hi! Do you want to see my under-the-sea craft project?
translation.it: Ciao! Volete vedere il mio progetto sottomarino?

translation.en: It's like an ocean in a box!
translation.it: È come un oceano in una scatola!

translation.en: And I even made these little fishies out of pipe cleaners.
translation.it: Ho fatto anche dei pesciolini con gli scovolini.

translation.en: [Gabby as MerCat] Ah, what a fin-tastic spot for a swim.
translation.it: Che posto branchiastico per una nuotata.

translation.en: And it can be even better with some…
translation.it: E sarà ancora meglio con delle…

translation.en: -♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪ -Oh! You know what that sound means.
translation.it: - Miao, miao, miao - Riconoscete la sigla?

translation.en: It's time for a Dollhouse Delivery. Come on!
Alright. Let's see what our Meow Meow Mailbox has for us today.
translation.it: Vediamo cosa ci ha portato oggi la Scatola Miao Miao.

translation.en: Do you think the surprise inside has something to do with MerCat?
translation.it: Secondo voi, la sorpresa riguarda Siregatta?
È come una lampada del genio
È la sorella di Siregatta, Solegatta.

translation.en: I've come to share something super special with you.
translation.it: Sono venuta a dirvi una cosa speciale.

translation.en: Today is the Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid-Lantis.
translation.it: Oggi c'è la Festa Scintillante di Siretlantide.

translation.en: All the colorful mermaids are going to be there, and we can ride the mermaid slide.
translation.it: Ci saranno tutte le sirene colorate e potremo andare sullo scivolo.

translation.en: Oh! You've just got to come. Please, please, please, please, please?
What do you think? Should we go to the Mermaid Sparkle Party?
translation.it: Che ne dite? Andiamo alla Festa Scintillante?

translation.en: Okay, go see MerCat. She knows the way.
Oh! And please tell her to bring her blue crystal.
translation.it: E ditele di portare il cristallo blu. Ci servirà.

translation.en: We can't go to the party without it. See you soon.
translation.it: E ditele di portare il cristallo blu. Ci servirà. Ci vediamo presto.

translation.en: We're going to a Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid-Lantis!
translation.it: Andremo alla Festa Scintillante di Siretlantide!

translation.en: ♪ A pinch on my left Pinch, pinch on my right ♪
translation.it: Un pizzico a sinistra e poi uno a destra

translation.en: ♪ Grab Pandy's hand and hold on tight! ♪
translation.it: Prendo la mano a Pandy e la tengo stretta

translation.en: Yoo-hoo! I'm over here, in the bathroom.
First things first, let's find Pandy.
Will you ever run out of hug attacks, Pandy?
Nope, because hug attacks are my thing. [gasps]
-Who's ready for a Mermaid Sparkle Party? -[gasps] We are!
translation.it: Siete pronti ad andare alla festa? Sì!

translation.en: I never say no to a mermaid party.
translation.it: Non dico mai no a una festa di sirene.

translation.en: Oh, MerCat, SunnyCat said to make sure you bring your…
translation.it: Siregatta, Solegatta ha detto di portare il tuo…

translation.en: [gasps] My crystal! Thanks for reminding me.
We're gonna need this to get to the party.
translation.it: Ci serve per andare alla festa.

translation.en: There's nothing better than the fresh sea air.
translation.it: Non c'è niente di meglio della brezza marina.

translation.en: Except maybe fresh sea air and a smoothie.
translation.it: Forse solo la brezza marina con un frullato.

translation.en: So, MerCat, how do we get to Mermaid-Lantis?
translation.it: Siregatta, come si arriva a Siretlantide?

translation.en: The first thing we have to do is look for the rainbow bubbles coming up from the water.
translation.it: Prima dobbiamo cercare le bolle arcobaleno che escono dall'acqua.

translation.en: Tell me when you see the rainbow bubbles.
translation.it: Ditemi se vedete le bolle arcobaleno.

translation.en: Whoa! Here comes a really big one.
She sure knows how to make an entrance.
Are you ready to see the magical world of Mermaid-Lantis?
translation.it: Siete pronti a vedere il magico mondo di Siretlantide?

translation.en: Then it's time to get your mermaid on.
translation.it: Allora è ora di vestirvi da sirene.

translation.en: -You mean we're going to become mermaids? -[Pandy gasps]
And every mermaid needs three important things.
translation.it: E ogni sirena ha bisogno di tre cose importanti.
Oh! La vasca è piena di bolle.

translation.en: Now you just dive under the bubbles to get your fin.
translation.it: Dovete tuffarvi tra le bolle per trovare la pinna.

translation.en: I can't believe I'm a real mermaid.
translation.it: Sono una sirena, non ci posso credere!

translation.en: Ooh! I love your pink ears.
I think this calls for a fishtail five.
Now that you have your fins…
you just need to find your sparkle within.
translation.it: dovete solo trovare la vostra scintilla interiore.

translation.en: Um… Where do we look for that?
Your sparkle within is that special thing that makes you happy.
translation.it: La scintilla interiore è quella cosa speciale che vi fa felici.

translation.en: Oh! I know. Doing my pinch-pinch always makes me feel happy.
translation.it: Fare un pizzico qua e uno là mi rende sempre felice.
Guardate! Ho trovato la mia scintilla.

translation.en: What special thing makes you feel happy?
translation.it: Qual è la cosa speciale che ti rende felice?

translation.en: [gasps] I know! Hugs are definitely my thing.
translation.it: Lo so io! Sono gli abbracci!

translation.en: What's something that makes you really happy?
translation.it: Cos'è che vi rende veramente felici?

translation.en: Okay, mermaids, it's off to Mermaid-Lantis we go.
translation.it: Ok, sirene, è ora di andare a Siretlantide.

translation.en: Look at all those glowing houses.
That's where all the mermaids live.
translation.it: È lì che vivono le sirene.

translation.en: Okay, then. We can take the rainbow slide.
translation.it: Ok, adesso facciamo lo scivolo arcobaleno.

translation.en: MerCat, did you bring your crystal? Ha! You know it.
translation.it: - Siregatta, hai portato il cristallo? - Certo.
E ora saltate su e scivolate!

translation.en: ♪ Catch a ride on a rainbow slide ♪
-A spa! Let's do our hair! -[scissors snipping]
♪ The homemade mermaid cakes Are tasty-licious ♪
translation.it: Le torte fatte in casa dalle sirene Sono gustosissime

translation.en: ♪ Have you ever seen anything Quite as cute as this is? ♪
translation.it: Hai mai visto niente di più carino?

translation.en: ♪ And the mermaids sing this tune ♪
translation.it: E le sirene che cantano questa canzone

translation.en: -♪ Mermaid-Lantis ♪ -♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
-♪ Mermaid-Lantis ♪ -♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
Wow! This rainbow slide is paw-tastic!
And it's the only way to get here,
translation.it: Ed è l'unico modo per arrivare qui,

translation.en: Is this where the Sparkle Party is happening?
translation.it: È qui che ci sarà la festa?

translation.en: This is where everyone will get to share that special thing that makes them happy.
translation.it: Qui tutti potranno condividere cos'è che li rende felici.

translation.en: I can't wait to see everyone's sparkle.
Everyone has their special sparkle except me.
translation.it: Hanno tutti la loro scintilla tranne me.

translation.en: Nothing special about ol' Kitty Squiddy.
translation.it: Gattina Calamaro non ha nulla di speciale.

translation.en: I wish there was a way to stop this whole Sparkle Party from happening.
translation.it: Vorrei trovare un modo per fermare la Festa Scintillante.

translation.en: [gasps] Everybody will be sliding down this rainbow soon.
Good thing we have our crystals, because without these crystals, there would be no rainbow.
translation.it: Per fortuna abbiamo i cristalli, perché senza, non ci sarebbe l'arcobaleno.

translation.en: -Sunny, come check out these Sea Sponges. -[Sea Sponges giggling]
translation.it: Sole, vieni a vedere queste spugne marine.

translation.en: Hey! If I take those crystals…
Poof! No more rainbow, no more party.
A scoodley, a doodley, a doo.
Sorry, mermaids, but it looks like the Sparkle Party is…
translation.it: Spiacente, sirene, ma temo che la festa sia stata…
Gattina si è presa i cristalli!

translation.en: If we can get those crystals back,
we can bring back the rainbow and save the Mermaid Sparkle Party.
translation.it: riavremo l'arcobaleno e salveremo la festa.

translation.en: Yeah! I didn't get all my mermaid on for nothing.
translation.it: Sì! Non mi sono vestito da sirena per niente.

translation.en: Well, I do know the way to Kitty Squiddy's cave.
translation.it: Io so dov'è la grotta di Gattina Calamaro.

translation.en: Great! Let's go talk to him and figure out what's going on.
translation.it: Bene! Andiamo a parlarle e vediamo di capire.

translation.en: ♪ A scoodley-doodley-dee ♪ ♪ No Sparkle Party for me ♪
translation.it: Addio, addio Non faccio festa neanche io

translation.en: Meowzers! He sure does like to dance.
translation.it: Miuao! Certo che le piace ballare!

translation.en: And he's definitely got some moves.
Well, moves or no moves, we need those crystals back.
translation.it: Beh, in ogni caso, ci servono i cristalli.
Non c'è nessun ballo senza il cristallo

translation.en: Alright, Kitty Squiddy, hand them over.
Hmph! Nope. Sorry. Not gonna happen.
translation.it: No. Spiacente. Non ci penso proprio.

translation.en: But we need them so everyone can get to the Sparkle Party.
translation.it: Ma ci servono per far arrivare gli ospiti.

translation.en: Don't you want to show everyone your special sparkle?
translation.it: Non vuoi mostrare a tutti la tua scintilla?

translation.en: Everyone has their special thing except me.
translation.it: Hanno tutti una cosa speciale, tranne me.

translation.en: Sorry, mermaids, but no crystals and no Sparkle Party.
translation.it: Spiacente, sirene, ma niente cristalli e niente festa.

translation.en: And to make extra sure the party doesn't happen…
translation.it: E per assicurarmi che non ci sia nessuna festa…

translation.en: A scoodley-doodley-dox. You'll never figure out my picture locks.
translation.it: Un bel trucco di magia. La combinazione è tutta mia.

translation.en: Thanks to these locks, we'll never get out.
translation.it: Con queste sbarre, non usciremo mai.

translation.en: Come on, Pandy. We can't get out yet.
translation.it: Coraggio, Pandy. Non possiamo uscire… ancora.

translation.en: [gasps] Look. The pictures on this lock are in a pattern.
translation.it: Guardate. Le immagini sui blocchi seguono un ordine preciso.

translation.en: I bet that if we can figure out what pictures go in these three spots,
translation.it: Se scopriamo quali figure vanno nei tre posti vuoti,

translation.en: the bars will open right up.

translation.it: riccio di mare, stella marina, conchiglia, conchiglia.
Riccio di mare, stella marina, conchiglia, conchiglia.
Per tutte le alghe! Ha funzionato!

translation.en: Fin-tastic job figuring out that pattern.
Okay, everybody, let's go save the Mermaid Sparkle Party!
translation.it: Ok, e ora andiamo a salvare la Festa delle Sirene.

translation.en: ♪ Scip-scap-scoodley-dow ♪ ♪ No one can show off their sparkle now ♪
translation.it: Senza cristalli non si balla E non ci sarà nessuna scintilla

translation.en: That Kitty Squiddy really loves to dance.
Dancing is Kitty Squiddy's sparkle. Look how happy it makes him.
translation.it: Il ballo è la sua scintilla. Guarda quant'è felice.

translation.en: -[Kitty Squiddy gasps] -Wait! Kitty Squiddy, you have to come to the party and show everyone your sparkle.
translation.it: Aspetta! Gattina Calamaro, vogliamo che mostri a tutti la tua scintilla.

translation.en: Pfft! I already told you, I don't have one.
translation.it: Ve l'ho già detto, non ce l'ho.

translation.en: Isn't there something you do that makes you feel really happy?
translation.it: Non c'è qualcosa che ti fa sentire veramente felice?

translation.en: Yeah! [giggles] -Dancing is your sparkle! -[Kitty Squiddy gasps]
translation.it: Sì! Il ballo è la tua scintilla!

translation.en: I'm sorry I took your crystals.
Can I help you put them back?
Do you want to put the first one in, Kitty Squiddy?
translation.it: Vuoi mettere tu il primo, Gattina?

translation.en: ♪ It's time for a Sparkle Party! ♪
Hey, since you've returned the crystals and you found your special sparkle,
translation.it: Visto che hai restituito i cristalli e hai trovato la tua scintilla,

translation.en: how would you like to be our guest of honor at the party?
translation.it: che ne diresti di essere l'ospite d'onore della festa?

translation.en: Well, then it's time to get your mermaid on!

translation.it: Ho trovato la scintilla Ed è qui che oggi si balla

translation.en: And you've definitely got your happy grin.
translation.it: E hai decisamente un gran sorriso.

translation.en: You just need your fin and you'll be an honorary mermaid.
translation.it: Ti manca solo la pinna e sarai una sirena speciale.

translation.en: Good thing I brought my Fin-tastic Travel Bubbles.
translation.it: Per fortuna ho portato le bolle da viaggio.

translation.en: Are you ready for that fin?
Wait. A fin will cover up my legs.
translation.it: Però la pinna mi coprirà le gambe.

translation.en: Then I won't be able to do my tentacle-tastic dance moves.
translation.it: E non potrò più fare i miei balli tentacolosi.
Che ne dici se facciamo così?
Una pinna per cappello E mi diverto mentre ballo

translation.en: We helped Kitty Squiddy find his sparkle.
translation.it: L'abbiamo aiutata a trovare la sua scintilla.

translation.en: -[Sea Sponge] Wahoo! -[Pandy] And the Sea Sponges!
♪ Let's talk about yours and mine ♪
-♪ Gonna let it shine ♪ -♪ Gonna let it shine ♪
♪ Watch me dancing like a champion ♪
♪ Yeah, everybody's got that ♪ ♪ Special something inside ♪
translation.it: Sì, hanno tutti una cosa speciale dentro

translation.en: ♪ That makes you want to shake your tail ♪
♪ Let's talk about yours and mine ♪
♪ Oh, these are all so great Let's celebrate ♪
I think that was our most mer-mazing adventure yet.
translation.it: È stata la nostra avventura più gattastica.

translation.en: Thanks for helping us get the crystals back
and helping Kitty Squiddy find his sparkle.
translation.it: e con la scintilla di Gattina Calamaro.

translation.en: Are you ready for one more surprise?
♪ Gabby Cat, Gabby Cat ♪ ♪ Gabby Cat, Gabby Cat ♪
♪ Gabby Cat, Gabby Cat Gabby Cat, Gabby Cat ♪
Do you know what word I really, really love?
translation.it: Sapete qual è la parola che amo di più?

translation.en: Yes, I love Pandy very much.
But I'm talking about the word "yet."
-♪ I don't know how to do this ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
translation.it: - Non so come si fa - Ancora!

translation.en: -♪ I may not have the answer ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪
translation.it: Mai dire mai, solo così migliorerai

translation.en: ♪ I don't know how to surf yet ♪
translation.it: Sul surf ancora non so andare

translation.en: ♪ Gotta dip my toe in first ♪
♪ Then gotta learn how to swim To begin this journey ♪
translation.it: Poi imparerò a nuotare Ma presto sul surf mi vedrai volare

translation.en: ♪ But soon I'll be hangin' ten! ♪
translation.it: Ma presto sul surf mi vedrai volare

translation.en: ♪ My cooking's less than perfect ♪ ♪ But I know that snack time's worth it ♪
translation.it: La mia cucina è sporca e orrenda Ma è ora di merenda

translation.en: ♪ So even if I make a sticky mess I'm gonna do my best to get better ♪
translation.it: E se ancora non so cucinare Imparerò per migliorare

translation.en: ♪ No need to feel low down ♪
♪ Just give it a go now ♪
♪ Pretty soon you're gonna know how ♪
♪ Just keep going and going, whoo! ♪
-♪ I don't know how to ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
translation.it: - Non so come si fa - Ancora

translation.en: -♪ I may not have the answer ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪
translation.it: Mai dire mai, solo così migliorerai

translation.en: ♪ My court game's not quite magic ♪
♪ Either with a racket or with a basket ♪
translation.it: Né col canestro né con la racchetta

translation.en: ♪ Right now it seems more like a chore But if I keep going I know I can score ♪
translation.it: Sembra impossibile da fare Ma se mi alleno so che posso segnare

translation.en: ♪ In the craft room it can get messy ♪
♪ But with more glitter and glue ♪
translation.it: Ma con glitter, colla e forbici

translation.en: ♪ I can do hard things With you and my besties ♪
translation.it: Posso divertirmi e creare con gli amici

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna satisfy my soul Gonna reach that goal! ♪
translation.it: E la mia anima soddisferò Raggiungerò l'obiettivo

translation.en: -♪ No need to feel low down ♪ -♪ Come on! ♪
-♪ Give it a go now ♪ -♪ You got this! ♪
-♪ Pretty soon you're gonna know how ♪ -♪ Come on! ♪
translation.it: - E presto saprai come fare - Dai!

translation.en: -♪ Just keep going and going ♪ -♪ Whoo! ♪
-♪ I don't know how to do this ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
translation.it: - Non so come si fa - Ancora!

translation.en: -♪ I may not have the answer ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪
translation.it: Mai dire mai, solo così migliorerai

translation.en: -♪ Don't know how to do this ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
translation.it: - Non so come si fa - Ancora!

translation.en: -♪ I may not have the answer ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪
translation.it: Mai dire mai, solo così migliorerai

translation.en: -♪ I don't know how to do this ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
translation.it: - Non so come si fa - Ancora!

translation.en: -♪ I may not have the answer ♪ -♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪
translation.it: Mai dire mai, solo così migliorerai

translation.en: And I love my mermaid ears.
translation.it: Adoro le mie orecchie da sirena.

translation.en: You know what else I love?
Come back next time and we'll open up another Dollhouse Surprise.
translation.it: Tornate, così apriremo insieme un'altra sorpresa.
